item.title: FPL Mythbusting with fplR
item.description: I recently authored my first R package (and definitely have the bug, now). It would be remiss of me to continue without a quick PSA for anyone out there thinking about dabbling in the package game - below is a shout-out of the invaluable resources I found along the way that kept me nice and sane. ease in https://t.co/NdRYGE1whA more detail https://t.co/ypqotSAF46 best practice https://t.co/qRMZDXBdfQ travis ðŸ’€ https://t.co/dEvM3PWsVb â€” ewen (@ewen_) June 7, 2017 In short, I set out on my package contribution journey by focusing on the development of something that I myself would find useful (that way, I could keep at least one user happy).
